summary: A simple mod to remove the clutter from the lockpicking menu.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ulWIz.png[/img][/center]

A simple interface mod to remove some of the unnecessary clutter in the lockpicking menu. I highly recommend to use this mod with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6594/]Lockpick graduation by Lilyu[/url]. An optional version with pick health displayed is available.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]


INSTALLATION:
Extract \"lockpickingmenu.swf\" to the Data\\Interface folder in your Skyrim directory.

DE-INSTALLATION:
Remove \"lockpickingmenu.swf\" from the Data\\Interface folder in your Skyrim directory.

KNOWN ISSUES:
Pick health does not reset to 100% after breaking a lockpick. Damaging a lockpick will make it start updating again.

CHANGELOG:
Version 1.20
 - Better spacing
Version 1.10
 - Fixed font issue
 - Added version with Pick Health
Version 1.0
 - Initial Upload

CREDITS:
SkyUI Team for their decompiled UI sources
author: Shadow771
